channel.title: Compile errors
channel.description:
ok well its a problem ive been having with all my compilers on everything i run it and javac is not recognized as a internal or external command
and i just need some help please i have looked on this forum and on dodian but i havent sucseeded yet :S
n if am gunna get burned...or sumet.......dont bother cos ur just lookin for truble going on a thread tryna cause a argument[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 08:10:01 AM[/size][hr]dudes plz help me am begging u

item.title: Compile errors
item.dc:creator: @lmafo_k0ed lmafo k0ed
item.description:
@lmafo_k0ed wrote:

3 things to do…

  1. make sure you have java downloaded (newest version)
    2.check your class paths go to tuts and the server tut is stickied read it.
  2. edit your compiler take everything off and put this:

@echo off title Server Compiler Color 0f "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
